data.title: How to watch the USA Network without cable 2024
data.meta_description: Learn how to watch USA Network effortlessly. Our guide includes the best streaming services and tips to get you started before the 2024 Summer Olympics.
data.text:
The best part about streaming services is they can often be tailored to just what you need. Love sports? Find a sports streaming service with a ton of channels. Love movies? Find a streamer with plenty of entertainment. Looking for how to watch USA Network? Consider it done. Ahead, we’ll break down everything you need to know about this specific entertainment channel and help you find the best USA Network streaming service for your content consumption. Make sure you lock in this channel before the 2024 Summer Olympics coverage begins to air!

What is USA Network?

USA Network is a cable sports network that also includes a variety of other programming. It originally launched in 1977 as the Madison Square Garden Sports Network before evolving. It has gone through several iterations through the years and has grown to become a massive entertainment channel. However, it remains dedicated to sports at its core and still hosts plenty of games and sports programming. But you’ll also find popular shows like “NCIS” and “Chicago P.D.” there, and it formerly hosted “Suits” and “Monk.”

No matter which Fubo package you choose, you’re getting USA Network — plus a ton of other channels to enjoy. The channel selection you’ll have may vary based on your geographic location, but the selection is the largest on the market when you look at the live TV streaming competitors. Plus, customers can stream on up to 10 devices at the same time, so it’s perfect for large families.

How to watch USA Network with Hulu + Live TV

Plan Cost Per Month Channels Free Trial Sling Blue

Sling Orange & Blue $55

Sling Blue and the combo Sling Orange & Blue plans include USA Network. Sling Orange doesn’t include the channel, so if you’re after that specific channel, you’ll want to avoid subscribing to just Sling Orange.

Sling TV also includes 50 hours of cloud DVR, but you can upgrade to 200 hours for an extra $5 per month.

How to watch USA Network with YouTube TV

Plan Cost Per Month Channels Free Trial YouTube TV $72.99

100+

Yes

Customers have access to USA Network with YouTube TV. The streaming service has just one plan, keeping it simple when it comes to subscribing. You’ll get unlimited simultaneous streams and unlimited cloud DVR. Beyond USA Network, you can also stream ESPN, BET, Disney Channel, Food Network, HGTV and more.

How to watch USA Network on the app

You can watch USA Network on the USA Network app by downloading it free through the iTunes store or Google Play store, however, you need a cable subscription to access live content.

FAQs

How can I watch USA Network for free?

You can watch USA Network on the USA Network app by downloading it for free through the iTunes store or Google Play store; however, you need a cable subscription to access live content.

Is USA Network part of Peacock?

Peacock has plenty of USA Network content. It’s not necessarily one of Peacock’s live channels, per se, but viewers can see a lot of USA Network’s shows, movies and games soon after they air live.

Is USA Network a sports channel?

Yes, technically, USA Network is a sports channel. However, the network airs a lot of content beyond just games, including movies and TV shows.
